level.heading: Incumbents.
level.text: A person holding an appointment to a position in the Executive Service on October 21, 1998 shall continue to be paid at his or her existing rate of pay until the Mayor effects a personnel action establishing a new salary within the designated range for the level of the position to which the person is appointed.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-124
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-124, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-603.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Applicability of § 101(m) of D.C. Law 12-124: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-610.51.
